channel.title: Comments on: What is Blockchain: Explained

item.title: By: CryptoP
item.dc:creator: CryptoP
item.description: Irreversible hashing of member(s) of an object makes it tough for anyone to launch attack of the block. But the 51% attack point of blockchain can be improved to remove the hope of hackers.
item.content:encoded: Irreversible hashing of member(s) of an object makes it tough for anyone to launch attack of the block. But the 51% attack point of blockchain can be improved to remove the hope of hackers.
